## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0553d3f4622f5a3a9cfb7d8edeaa1a94729049ebc426512ad4cd0c05a76888f1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'snap-design-system-icons' @ 10.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
